00048 template< class T >
00049 class TagScalar
00050     :   public Tag
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     explicit TagScalar( const QString & name, bool isMandatory = false );
00054     TagScalar( Tag & owner, const QString & name, bool isMandatory = false );
00055 
00056     virtual ~TagScalar();

00064     setValue( const T & v );

00091         const QString & str );

00120 template< class T >
00121 const T &
00122 TagScalar< T >::value() const
00123 {
00124     return m_value;
00125 }
00126 
00127 template< class T >
00128 void
00129 TagScalar< T >::setValue( const T & v )
00130 {
00131     if( m_constraint )
00132     {
00133         if( !m_constraint->check( v ) )
00134             throw Exception( QString( "Invalid value: \"%1\". "
00135                 "Value must match to the constraint." )
00136                     .arg( Format< T >::toString( v ) ) );
00137     }
00138 
00139     m_value = v;
00140 
00141     setDefined();
00142 }
00143 
00144 template< class T >
00145 void
00146 TagScalar< T >::queryOptValue( T & receiver )
00147 {
00148     if( isDefined() )
00149         receiver = m_value;
00150 }
00151 
00152 template< class T >
00153 void
00154 TagScalar< T >::setConstraint( Constraint< T > * c )
00155 {
00156     m_constraint = c;
00157 }
00158 
00159 template< class T >
00160 QString
00161 TagScalar< T >::print( int indent ) const
00162 {
00163     QString result;
00164 
00165     if( isDefined() )
00166     {
00167         for( int i = 0; i < indent; ++i )
00168             result.append( QLatin1String( "\t" ) );
00169 
00170         result.append( QLatin1String( "{" ) );
00171         result.append( name() );
00172         result.append( QLatin1String( " " ) );
00173 
00174         QString value = Format< T >::toString( m_value );
00175         value = toQtConfFileFormat( value );
00176 
00177         result.append( value );
00178 
00179         if( !children().isEmpty() )
00180         {
00181             result.append( QLatin1String( "\n" ) );
00182 
00183             foreach( Tag * tag, children() )
00184                 result.append( tag->print( indent + 1 ) );
00185 
00186             for( int i = 0; i < indent; ++i )
00187                 result.append( QLatin1String( "\t" ) );
00188         }
00189 
00190         result.append( QLatin1String( "}\n" ) );
00191     }
00192 
00193     return result;
00194 }
00195 
00196 template< class T >
00197 void
00198 TagScalar< T >::onStart( const ParserInfo & info )
00199 {
00200     Q_UNUSED( info )
00201 }
00202 
00203 template< class T >
00204 void
00205 TagScalar< T >::onFinish( const ParserInfo & info )
00206 {
00207     foreach( Tag * tag, children() )
00208     {
00209         if( tag->isMandatory() && !tag->isDefined() )
00210             throw Exception( QString( "Undefined child mandatory tag: \"%1\". "
00211                 "Where parent is: \"%2\". "
00212                 "In file \"%3\" on line %4." )
00213                     .arg( tag->name() )
00214                     .arg( name() )
00215                     .arg( info.fileName() )
00216                     .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00217     }
00218 }
00219 
00220 template< class T >
00221 void
00222 TagScalar< T >::onString( const ParserInfo & info,
00223     const QString & str )
00224 {
00225     if( !isDefined() )
00226     {
00227         T value = Format< T >::fromString( info, str );
00228 
00229         if( m_constraint )
00230         {
00231             if( !m_constraint->check( value ) )
00232                 throw Exception( QString( "Invalid value: \"%1\". "
00233                     "Value must match to the constraint. "
00234                     "In file \"%2\" on line %3." )
00235                         .arg( str )
00236                         .arg( info.fileName() )
00237                         .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00238         }
00239 
00240         m_value = value;
00241 
00242         setDefined();
00243     }
00244     else
00245         throw Exception( QString( "Value for the tag \"%1\" already defined. "
00246             "In file \"%2\" on line %3." )
00247                 .arg( name() )
00248                 .arg( info.fileName() )
00249                 .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00250 }

00369         {

00409 inline
00410 void
00411 TagScalar< bool >::onString( const ParserInfo & info,
00412     const QString & str )
00413 {
00414     if( !isDefined() )
00415     {
00416         m_value = Format< bool >::fromString( info, str );
00417 
00418         setDefined();
00419     }
00420     else
00421         throw Exception( QString( "Value for the tag \"%1\" already defined. "
00422             "In file \"%2\" on line %3." )
00423                 .arg( name() )
00424                 .arg( info.fileName() )
00425                 .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
